text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Thank you!!! As a mobile dentist, I can provide full dental service in the comfort of your own home, or the White house in your case! Less exposure to coronavirus and more convenient. Innovation at its finest! Let me know, I’m one knock away for your next cleaning! 🦷❤️
